content: Hi FHIR people. Just learned from this chat, so I wanted to join the community.
Hi FHIR people. I've also just learned of the chat and happy to join from Dublin, Ireland.
Hello everyone from the Canadian West Coast.

Hi, just introducing myself to the forum. I am work at BPAC Clinical Solutions NZ and am working on a project to use FHIR for connecting decision support applications to Practice Management Systems in the primary health sector.

Hi Chris. Great news! It would be interesting to hear more about your project on the New Zealand stream - e.g. which PMS vendors you currently working with; what version of FHIR you are using and whether you're implementing SMART on FHIR or CDS Hooks.
Hello From DSS inc. - Palm Beach, I am new to this Site; Lloyd Tanks for the FHIR Training (interesting, hopefully in the future we can use FHIR In our environments).

Hello all from Boston! Thank you @Rob Hausam and @Grahame Grieve for your introduction to this community. I am director of the Open Concept Lab (OCL), an open-source and cloud-based terminology management service focused primarily low-income countries that is part of OpenHIE. Interested in contributing to this community and hopefully collaborating on OCL on FHIR!
By all means welcome to the community
Welcome, @Jonathan Payne. It's good to have you on here. I'm looking forward to our collaboration!
